alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 7:54AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Smith, west central Panola, northern Rusk, southeastern Gregg and north central Cherokee Counties through 830 AM CST... At 754 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Joinerville, or near Henderson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Overton, Tatum, New London, Arp, Joinerville, Turnertown, Easton, Chapman, Concord, Monroe, Stewart, Chalk Hill, Church Hill and Oak Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
